comments.body: Why do we need this class actually?

Good question, this class provides a custom dropdown toggle as per the pattern in the [react-bootstrap docs](https://react-bootstrap.github.io/components/dropdowns/#btn-dropdowns-custom) (cmd+f for "Custom Dropdown Components"). We pass `bsRole` to this component as described in the docs. `bsClass` seems to be passed to this component by the react-bootstrap framework, so we include it here to avoid PropType validation errors.
